snippet: Nail Yakupov shook off an early collision and scored a winning power-play goal in the second period to lead the Edmonton Oilers to a 2-1 victory over the host Devils.
abstract: Edmonton Oilers beat New Jersey Devils, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: Nail Yakupov shook off an early collision and scored a winning power-play goal in the second period to lead the Edmonton Oilers to a 2-1 victory over the host Devils.

headline.main: Devils Fall at Home to Oilers
headline.print_headline: Devils Fall at Home to Oilers
